      Get a relative date (yesterday, last week, etc.) compared to the current date.

      For instance:
        Date aMonthAgo = DateHelper.getDate(30, Time.BEFORE);
        Date aWeekAgo = DateHelper.getDate(7, Time.BEFORE);

    • Method Detail

      • createDate

        public static java.util.Date createDate​(java.util.Date datePart,
                                        java.util.Date timePart)
        Build a new Date from two Date-typed parameters, the first one representing an actual date (yyyy-MM-dd) and a second one representing the time of of day (hh:mm:ss). For instance, if the first parameter represents 2018-01-31 at 00:00:00, and the second one represents 1970-01-01 at 15:30:00, then builds a Date representing 2018-01-31 at 15:30:00 and returns it.
        Parameters:
        datePart - a Date object in which time-related fields are ignored.
        timePart - a Date object in which date-related fields are ignored. , e.g. 15:36:07 (date-part ignored)
        Returns:
        new date, e.g. 08-06-2016 15:36:07

      • daysBetween

        public static long daysBetween​(java.util.Date firstDate,
                               java.util.Date secondDate)
        Return the number of days between two dates.
        Parameters:
        firstDate - first date
        secondDate - second date
        Returns:
        number of days between the two dates

      • getDate

        public static java.util.Date getDate​(int numberOfDays,
                                     Dates.Time time)
        Get a relative date (yesterday, last week, etc.) compared to the current date.

        For instance:
          Date aMonthAgo = DateHelper.getDate(30, Time.BEFORE);
          Date aWeekAgo = DateHelper.getDate(7, Time.BEFORE);
          Date yesterday = DateHelper.getDate(1, Time.BEFORE);
          Date tomorrow = DateHelper.getDate(1, Time.AFTER);
        Parameters:
        numberOfDays - a positive or negative number of days
        time - one of {BEFORE, AFTER}
        Returns:
        date relative to the current date

      • isLeapYear

        public static boolean isLeapYear​(int year)

        public static java.time.LocalDate toLocalDate​(java.util.Date date)
        Convert a Date into a LocalDate instance.
        Parameters:
        date - to convert
        Returns:
        the LocalDate instance

        public static java.util.Date toDate​(java.time.LocalDate localDate)
        Convert a LocalDate into a Date instance.
        Parameters:
        localDate - to convert
        Returns:
        the Date instance
